name: France
description: 'Dog' in French is 'Chien'! Here we see a Chien with a cool hat next to the Eifel Tower.Hou la la!

name: Germany
description: 'Dog'' in German is 'Hund'! Here we see a handsome Hund in a traditional pair of Lederhosen. Prost!

name: Canada
description: Canadians may refer to a 'Dog'' as either 'Dog'' or 'Chien' because those cunning Canadians speak French and English! Here we see a majestic mountie dog. Pretty cool, eh?

name: Japan
description: 'Dog' in Japanese is '犬 (Inu)'! Here we see an incredible Inu in an intriguing kimono. Kanpai!

name: Mexico
description: 'Dog' in Spanish is 'Perro'! Here we see a Perro wearing a proper poncho topped off with a spectacular sombrero. olé!

name: England
description: The English speak English, so they say 'Dog' the exact same way we do! Here we see an extatic English Bulldog unwinding on top of a Union Jack. Pip Pip, Cheerio!

name: Egypt
description: The Egyptians speak Arabic. In Arabic, 'Dog is 'الكلب' or 'Alkalb'! Here we see a dog dressed as a proper Pharaoh. So stoic!

name: Brazil
description: Brazilians speak Portugese! In Portugese, 'Dog' is 'Cachorro'! Here we see a Cachorro chilling in a cool soccer costume. Bom dia!

name: Italy
description:
The official language of the Vatican City is Italian! In Italian, 'Dog' is 'Cane'! Here we see a cunning Cane posing as the Pope with proper posture.

Salute!

name: Greece
description:
In Greek 'σκύλος (skýlos)'! Here we see a stunning Skýlos wearing endearing emperor clothing.

Opa!

name: Holland
description: In Dutch, 'Dog' is 'Hond'! Here we see an honest Hond honoring Holland with a Holland heritage haircut. Gefeli!

name: Ireland
description: In Irish, 'Dog' is 'Madra'! Here we see a magnificent Madra sporting a marvelous lepperchaun costume. Top O' the Mornin'!

name: Norway
description: In Norwegian, 'Dog' is 'Hund'! Here we see an honorable Hund lookimg heroic in a viking costume. Argh!

name: USA
description: Here we have an all-American dog looking dashing in an Uncle Sam outfit! WOW!
